summary: Page 5 covers continuation of section yod-zayin and sections yod-chet through kaf-gimel. All section numbers are sequential and correct. Source references appear accurate. Minor meta page_side issue.

issues.description: Page side is marked as 'left' but page כה (25) is odd-numbered, which should be right page in a Hebrew book.

OCR has 'דהוה כמלא חוטו של ים [?]' with a question mark bracket indicating uncertainty. This is the standard Talmudic phrase 'כמלוא חוטו של חמה' (the fullness of a thread of the sun). The word should be 'חמה' not 'ים'.
OCR has 'על פ' בלאה [?]' with uncertainty marker. This reference in the context of שוחר טוב (Midrash Tehillim) is unclear at this resolution.
